sentences.en: All wood ( no plastic ) for proven durability and heightened responsiveness and control.
sentences.cn: 由全实木制成,提升耐久力、反应力和控制力.

sentences.en: Customer understanding? improve customer understanding through responsiveness and commitment.
sentences.cn: 客户了解度 ― ―通过积极响应和承诺增进客户对公司的了解.

sentences.en: DSM uses traction control and electric power steering to give better responsiveness.
sentences.cn: 电力需求侧管理使用牵引力控制系统和电动助力转向系统,以更好地响应.

sentences.en: Firms pursuing a multidomestic strategy focus on local responsiveness.
sentences.cn: 奉行多国战略的公司关注地区反应.

sentences.en: Formulated with powerful cleansing agents, the fuel also helps improve responsiveness.
sentences.cn: 这种带有清洁因子燃油还可以提高反应能力.

sentences.en: Given its responsiveness to output, a lively rebound in trade is not inconceivable.
sentences.cn: 鉴于它对于产出的回应, 贸易的反弹是惊人的.

sentences.en: If you are not interested, your responsiveness will still demonstrate your professionalism.
sentences.cn: 如果你不太在意这份工作, 你的热诚也会体现出你的职业精神.

sentences.en: It is suggested that exposure to cotton dust may increase airway responsiveness in new workers.
sentences.cn: 结论棉尘职业暴露可引起新工人气道反应性的增高.

sentences.en: Performance testing to gauge the scalability and responsiveness of new services should always be part of the plan.
sentences.cn: 性能测试用于测定新服务的可伸缩性和响应能力，应当是计划的一部分。

sentences.en: Results The total score of the responsiveness of inpatients was 7.52.
sentences.cn: 结果银川市住院病人的卫生系统反应性总水平为7.52.

sentences.en: So we're seeing this push across the industry both in IT and in systems for more responsiveness and faster ability to do integration of software with other parts of what they're doing.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们正在同时从 IT 和系统方面看到这种跨行业的推动力，即实现更高的响应能力和更快地完成软件与它们所做工作的其他部分集成的能力。

sentences.en: Such responsiveness to public pressure is extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 对公众压力如此快速积极的反应是非凡的。

sentences.en: The idea is to boost efficiency, quality, and responsiveness by giving rank and - file employees more say.
sentences.cn: 这种新的开发理论旨在提高生产效率, 质量和责任感, 并让普通的员工具有更多的发言权.

sentences.en: The responsiveness of ability activations has been improved.
sentences.cn: 增加技能发动的流畅度.

sentences.en: This in turn reduces hardware and licensing costs at the database layer, and can improve the database responsiveness overall for applications sharing this resource.
sentences.cn: 这转而降低数据库级的硬件和许可成本，且可为共享该资源的应用程序提高数据库总体响应能力。

sentences.en: Users'expectations for application responsiveness also are increasing.
sentences.cn: 用户对应用程序的响应性能的期望值也在增长.

sentences.en: Vernon's fancy of her must have sprung from her prompt and most musical responsiveness.
sentences.cn: 维农对她的看法肯定来自她能敏捷和极富有乐感地回答问题.

sentences.en: We define our behavior by our professionalism, integrity, ethics, objectivity, innovation, accessibility, consistency and responsiveness.
sentences.cn: 我们的行为具有专业性, 完整性, 道德规范性, 客观性, 创新性, 易接近性, 一致性和响应性.

words.tran_cn: 负责的，可靠的；有责任的
